name: @headlamp-k8s/headlamp-build
description: Use 'npm start' to get going quickly. See contrib guide docs for more info. For building and running Headlamp without Make.

scripts.backend: npm install && cross-env HEADLAMP_BACKEND_TOKEN=headlamp HEADLAMP_CONFIG_ENABLE_HELM=true HEADLAMP_CONFIG_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLUSTERS=true ./backend/headlamp-server -dev -proxy-urls https://artifacthub.io/* -enable-dynamic-clusters

author: Headlamp devs
